abstract: This case report presents the clinical picture, diagnostic methodology, and surgical treatment of a 30 years old female patient, who presented with hoarseness of voice and difficulty in breathing. Direct laryngoscopy showed mass in right side of subglottic region, and biopsy-proven adenoid cystic carcinoma. Total laryngectomy was performed and patient was discharged three weeks postoperatively and doing well.
title: Adenoid cystic carcinoma of larynx.
